quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar contains about 16 calories, all from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in teaspoon sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 calories per level teaspoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, 1 teaspoon sugar is 4 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber or protein.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a teaspoon?
faqs.a: About 4 g of sugar, providing 16 kcal.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Similar calories (around 16 per teaspoon), but brown has trace fiber from molasses.
